job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Job Description
A Software Development company is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a full-time Direct Hire basis. You’d be joining a team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives. You’ll be responsible for taking the lead on relevant projects while surrounded by people who will provide support and mentorship.
As a Site Reliability Engineer, you’ll mainly be focused on running better production application and systems, creating a strict engineering discipline and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problems.
Required Skills & Experience
Azure and AWS
Azure DevOps
Scripting in either Java or Powershell
Terraform and ansible
Kubernetes
Desired Skills & Experience
5+ years of experience in an DevOps Environment.
Oracle
Springboot
Docker
The Offer
Competitive Salary: Up to $155K/year, DOE
You Will Receive The Following Benefits
health, dental, vision
401(k)
Casual and Flexible Work Culture and Environment
Ability to work in a Tech-driven company
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.
Posted By:
Connor Bowles
